DOC.detailed_description: Background : The EXCELSIOR trial demonstrate 7-fold increased risk death , myocardial infarction target vessel reintervention within 30 day patient platelet inhibition median study cohort bolus dose 600 mg clopidogrel . The median platelet inhibition cohort 14 % optical aggregation stimulation 5 µM ADP . Aim : To evaluate efficacy clopidogrel dose adjustment patient insufficient platelet inhibition elective coronary stent implantation Methods : This prospective , single-center study evaluate antiplatelet effect 120 patient receive bolus dose 600 mg clopidogrel undergo elective coronary stent implantation . Platelet inhibition evaluate 24 hour , 14 28 day coronary intervention use optical aggregometry ( 5 µM ADP ) determination surface protein expression flow cytometry ( P-Selectin , gp55 , activate GP IIb/IIIa ) . If 24 hour coronary stent implantation optical aggregation > 14 % , patient receive additional bolus dose 300 mg clopidogrel , follow daily dose 150 mg least 28 day . If optical aggregation point time ≤14 % patient receive daily dose 75 mg clopidogrel . No dose adjustment follow perform .
